## NS.getHostname() method

Returns a string with the hostname of the server that the script is running on.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getHostname(): Host;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Host](./bitburner.host.md)

Hostname of the server that the script is on.
